LanguageData.Shell_GasAcid.label: corrosive gas shell
LanguageData.Shell_GasAcid.description: A shell filled with corrosive gas. Can be fired from mortars. Damages everythign with burn damage (doesn't work on mechanoids), will also damage clothing, structures, and equipment.
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_GasAcid.label: corrosive gas shell
LanguageData.Shell_GasDefNanite.label: defense nanites gas shell
LanguageData.Shell_GasDefNanite.description: A shell filled with nanites that can detect friend or foe.
LanguageData.GasTrap_Bullet_Shell_GasDefNanite.label: defense nanites gas shell
